text: [Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
hi there I'm pan a cloud support
engineer at the AWS office in Cape Town
today I'll show you how to request an
increase to your SMS spending limit when
you use Amazon simple notification
service to send SMS messages let's get
started after you reach the monthly SMS
messaging spending limit for your AWS
account you receive a no quota left for
account provider response in the SNS
delivery status logs when you send SMS
messages through Amazon SNS to resolve
this error you must request a spending
limit increase however this spending
limit is at the region level so you must
be sure to request the spending limit
quota increase for the correct region
first determine how much of a spending
increase you require you can calculate
this by multiplying the expected number
of SMS messages per month by the cost
per message part the cost is around
0.266 USD per message pot for most
countries but make sure that you double
check the pricing for your specific
destination country where you send SMS
messages to you can find the pricing for
specific countries in our worldwide SMS
pricing page in the knowledge Center
article Linked In the video description
for example if you expect expect to send
300 SMS messages per day this means that
you will send 9,000 messages per 30-day
month because each message is just one
part your calculation is the amount of
9,000 multiplied by
0.266 this is the calculation for the
example when calculating your SMS spin
quarter it's a best practice to
understand these limits a single SMS
message part can contain up to 140 bytes
of information or 160 characters for the
gsm 7bit alphabet if an SMS message
contains more than the maximum number of
characters or maximum amount of bytes
then the message splits into multiple
SMS message Parts with each part not
exceeding the maximum limits mentioned
above the maximum number of characters
in a single SMS message part depends on
the type of encoding for the characters
that you use
now let's create an AWS support limit
increase case first log into your AWS
account then navigate to the search bar
on the top and search for support
navigate to the AWS support center and
then choose create case click on the
looking for service quter increases link
click on create case
instead select SNS text messaging for
the service in the
drop-down you can provide a link to your
website here you can specify what type
of messages you want to send you can
also select which AWS region you are
sending SMS messages from you can
provide the countries you plan on
sending SMS messages to you can provide
information about how your recipients
opt into to SMS messages from you you
can also provide a message template that
you intend on using to send your SMS
messages moving on to the mandatory
Fields select the region you are using
SNS in from the region drop- down list
select the resource type as general
limits select account spend threshold
increase for SMS for quota enter in your
new Kota value enter a use case
description to provide further details
on your request
please ensure not to enter in any
sensitive information in your
description an example is as follows AWS
can deny requests for very high limits
without a legitimate use case so provide
as much detail as possible in your
description after the limit increase is
approved you must update your spending
preference in the SNS console now you
can click submit
navigate to the SNS console select text
messaging click on edit preferences
under delivery status
log change the value for your account
spend limit to the new value you
requested and now save the changes so
now you know how you can request a
spending limit increase for SMS messages
in Amazon
SNS thanks for watching and Happy Cloud
Compu from all of us here at AWS
[Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
[Music]
